text: Jamal Yagoobi is a George I. Alden Professor at the Worcester Polytechnic Institute, Worcester, Massachusetts. He was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to electrohydrodynamics. Yagoobi obtained BS in mechanical engineering in 1978. He attended University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign, graduating with MS and Ph.D. in the same field in 1981 and 1984 respectively. ==References== ==External links== * Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:Iranian mechanical engineers Category:Sharif University of Technology alumni Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Worcester Polytechnic Institute faculty Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Jamal Yagoobi
